title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 342.4 - Withdrawal of objection; settlement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 342.4 - Withdrawal of objection; settlement

State Regulations
A carrier may file with the chair, not later than the 10th
day prior to the date set for hearing, a withdrawal of objection on a form
(A-3) prescribed by the chair for that purpose, in which event the chair will
refund to the podiatrist the $5 arbitration fee paid by him or her. If the
parties to the dispute settle their differences within 10 days prior to the
date set for hearing, notice of settlement on a form (A-4) prescribed by the
chair for that prupose shall be signed by all parties and filed with the chair
on or before the date set for hearing. The parties to such a settlement shall
each pay to the chair a minimum arbitration fee of $5 in the manner provided in
section
342.9
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
342.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
